Question: Depp has stated that he based many of Sparrow's mannerisms on this person.
Hints: In 1994 this person said his image was "like a long shadow ..
In mid-1962 this person had left Sidcup Art College to devote himself to music and moved into a London flat with Jagger and Jones.
This person met Jagger on a train as Jagger was headed to classes at the London School of Economics.
